summary:
Socialism is an economic and political idea where the community, rather than individuals, owns and controls important resources like factories and businesses. It aims to create a fairer society by sharing wealth and power. There are different types of socialism, some wanting more government control and others supporting a mix of private and public ownership.

Socialists believe capitalism creates problems like inequality and economic crises. They advocate for social justice, often supporting causes like feminism and environmentalism. While some countries have tried socialist systems, many modern socialists now favor a more democratic approach, called democratic socialism.
title: Socialism
